response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This extraordinary item carries a significant value of $1,200,000 to us, reflecting its unique features, quality, and the time invested in its creation. We believe it holds immense potential to be a valuable asset for you. Considering its exceptional attributes, we are offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $1,100,000. We trust that you will appreciate its worth and consider this offer carefully. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1100000}
